author: jstrachan
msg: added an empty maven.xml which we'll fill in later with some callbacks etc

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a new invokeBody(outpuit) helper method that should be used in preference to the existing getBody().run(context, output) mechanism.

It will allow us to maybe change the script-invocation protocol slightly, such as maybe making Tags on the stack in multi threaded servers, rather than instance data of the TagScript as it is right now

author: jstrachan
msg: Added some extra logging if an exception is caught inside a tag script

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for bob's beforeSetAttributes() callback making it easy for DyanBeanSupport derivations to handle the cleaning/construction of DynaBeans or other such data structures
